attributes.action: Crush and destory cars of owners who are found to not have car tax and or insurance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a tax payer I am sick and tired of hearing how people drive around without insurance or road tax. They seem to get a slap on the wrist and not much more. Therefore if a car is found to not have insurance or car tax by the Police then the vehicle is confiscated by the Police there and then and it is destroyed.
